Cover Date: October 2007

Issue Tagline: None.

Astonishing X-Men (2004) #22 Wolverine Cover

Story Arc(s):    Add/remove story arcs to this issue
Unstoppable

Synopsis:
The Break World spy who recieved orders last issue conveys them to Kruun who it is revealed knows he is a double agent and are actually spying on SWORD instead. Kruun plans to destroy the X-Men..
